Attribute.AttributeName: Microsoft.Build.Framework.RequiredRuntime("v2.0")

summary.span: 實作 GenerateResource 工作。

span.span: Implements the GenerateResource task.

summary.span: 請使用專案檔中的 GenerateResource 項目，來建立和執行這項工作。

span.span: Use the GenerateResource element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: 如需用法和參數資訊，請參閱 [GenerateResource 工作](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c0aff32f-f2cc-46f6-9c3e-a5c9f8f912b1)。

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [GenerateResource Task](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c0aff32f-f2cc-46f6-9c3e-a5c9f8f912b1).

summary.span: 取得或設定 GenerateResource 工作所執行相依性檢查的其他輸入。

span.span: The additional inputs for the dependency checking that the GenerateResource task performs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如範例、 專案及.targets 檔案應為輸入，以確保如果會更新所有資源會重新都產生。For example, the project and targets files should be inputs to ensure that if they are updated all resources are regenerated.

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，指定要建立新的 以評估資源檔 (.resx) ()，還是只有在資源檔參考使用者的組件時才建立新的 ()。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether to create a new to evaluate the resources (.resx) files () or to create a new only when the resources files reference a user's assembly ().

value.span: 如果GenerateResource工作應該建立新以評估資源 (.resx) 檔中;如果GenerateResource工作應該建立新只有資源 (.resx) 檔參考使用者的組件時。

span.span: if the GenerateResource task should create a new to evaluate the resources (.resx) files; if the GenerateResource task should create a new only when the resources (.resx) files reference a user's assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是 `false`。The default value is `false`.

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定用於從中載入 .resx 檔類型的參考。

span.span: Gets or sets the references to load types in .resx files from.

value.span: 用於從中載入 .resx 檔類型的參考。

span.span: The references to load types in .resx files from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Resx 檔案資料元素可能具有 .NET 型別。Resx file data elements may have a .NET type. 讀取 .resx 檔時，必須解析此型別。When the .resx file is read, this must be resolved. 一般而言，使用標準型別載入規則即可順利解析。Typically, it is resolved successfully by using standard type loading rules. 如果您提供 中的組件，則會優先使用它們。If you provide assemblies in , they take precedence. 強型別資源不需要此參數。This parameter is not required for strongly typed resources.

span.span: Since the targets now will pass in the Windows SDK path we should use this for logging.

Attribute.AttributeName: Microsoft.Build.Framework.Output
Microsoft.Build.Framework.Required
get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定要轉換的項目。

span.span: Gets or sets the items to convert.

value.span: 要轉換的項目。

span.span: The items to convert.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳遞給此參數的項目必須具有下列其中一個副檔名︰Items passed to this parameter must have one of the following file extensions: - `.txt`： 指定要轉換的文字檔案的副檔名。`.txt`: Specifies the extension for a text file to convert. 文字檔只能包含字串資源。Text files can only contain string resources. - `.resx`： 指定要轉換的 XML 架構資源檔的擴充功能。`.resx`: Specifies the extension for an XML-based resource file to convert. - `.restext`： 指定相同的格式為.txt。`.restext`: Specifies the same format as .txt. 如果您想要清楚地區分包含資源的原始程式檔和建置流程中的其他原始程式檔，這個不同的副檔名會很有用。This different extension is useful if you want to clearly distinguish source files that contain resources from other source files in your build process. `.resources`： 指定要轉換的資源檔的擴充功能。`.resources`: Specifies the extension for a resource file to convert.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定此屬性，可為基底檔案名稱，視語言擴充功能的類別名稱。If this property is not specified, the name of the class is used as the base filename, with the extension dependent on the language. 例如：`MyClass.cs`。For example: `MyClass.cs`.

summary.span: 取得或設定產生強類型資源的類別來源時，所使用的語言。

span.span: Gets or sets the language to use when generating the class source for the strongly typed resource.

value.span: 產生強類型資源的類別來源時，所使用的語言。

span.span: The language to use when generating the class source for the strongly typed resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性必須比對完全 CodeDomProvider 所使用的語言之一。This property must match exactly one of the languages used by the CodeDomProvider. 例如：`VB` 或 `C#`。For example: `VB` or `C#`. 藉由將值傳遞給此參數，您可以指示工作產生強型別資源。By passing a value to this parameter, you instruct the task to generate strongly typed resources.

summary.span: 包含 FileTracker.dll 之適當 .NET Framework 位置的路徑。

span.span: Path to the appropriate .NET Framework location that contains FileTracker.dll.

summary.span: 如果設定，使用者要負責確定所傳遞的 FileTracker.dll 的位元和他們想要使用 ResGen.exe 的位元相符。

span.span: If set, the user takes responsibility for making sure that the bitness of the FileTracker.dll that they pass matches the bitness of the ResGen.exe that they intend to use.

summary.span: 如果未設定，工作會根據目前的 .NET Framework 版本決定適當的位置。

span.span: If not set, the task decides the appropriate location based on the current .NET Framework version.

value.span: 傳回 。

span.span: Returns .

span.span: Gets or sets the intermediate directory into which the tracking logs from running this task will be placed.

value.span: 傳回要放置因執行這項工作而產生之追蹤記錄檔的中繼目錄。

span.span: Returns the intermediate directory into which the tracking logs from running this task will be placed.

summary.span: 包含 Tracker.exe 之適當 Windows SDK 位置的路徑。

span.span: Path to the appropriate Windows SDK location that contains Tracker.exe.

summary.span: 如果設定，使用者要負責確定所傳遞的 Tracker.exe 的位元和他們想要使用 ResGen.exe 的位元相符。

span.span: If set, the user takes responsibility for making sure that the bitness of the Tracker.exe that they pass matches the bitness of the ResGen.exe that they intend to use.

summary.span: 如果未設定，工作會根據目前的 Windows SDK 決定適當的位置。

span.span: If not set, the task decides the appropriate location based on the current Windows SDK.

value.span: 傳回 。

summary.span: 取得或設定參數，這個參數指定是否應該追蹤檔案存取模式。

span.span: Gets or sets a switch that specifies whether we should be tracking file access patterns.

value.span: 如果應該追蹤檔案存取模式則為 true，否則為 false。

span.span: True if we should be tracking file access patterns; false otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要支援累加建置，就必須追蹤檔案存取模式。To support incremental build, it is necessary to track file access patterns.
